plot outline: Savita nurtures and provides her children with everything, often at the cost of her own requirements. And when she needed them the most, her children didn't have the time to look after her. Savita decides not to settle out and embarks on a journey to reinvent her life. Will she rise like a phoenix against all odds and make herself an independent successful woman? Watch Janani - An emotional saga of a mother's journey.
title: Janani
plot: Savita nurtures and provides her children with everything, often at the cost of her own requirements. And when she needed them the most, her children didn't have the time to look after her. Savita decides not to settle out and embarks on a journey to reinvent her life. Will she rise like a phoenix against all odds and make herself an independent successful woman? Watch _Janani_ (qv) - An emotional saga of a mother's journey.
